mdRecord.dcterms:title: Mount Vernon Mansion, west front
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Providence Journal Company
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black and white horizontal image of the Mansion's west front, taken from the bowling green. Both colonnades and people walking in front of the Mansion also appear. The Providence Journal Company's rights stamp appears on reverse.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mansion exterior
mdRecord.dcterms:rights: Courtesy of the Providence Sunday Journal: This photograph may not be used elsewhere or reproduced without authorization of the Providence Journal Company.
